tasks.task: Audit existing Next.js application structure and identify missing components for NC State Sports Hub
tasks.description: Review current homepage, identify missing sports components, and create component roadmap
tasks.deliverables: frontend-audit-report.md with 12 identified missing components and 4-phase implementation plan

tasks.task: Review AWS Amplify configuration and optimize DynamoDB schemas for sports data
tasks.description: Analyze current backend setup and recommend improvements for sports data handling

tasks.task: Implement complete AWS Cognito authentication flow with NC State student/fan user profiles
tasks.description: Create login/logout, user profiles, and role-based access for students vs general fans

tasks.task: Set up GitHub Actions workflows for testing, deployment, and cost monitoring
tasks.description: Create comprehensive CI/CD pipeline with Lighthouse checks and AWS cost alerts

tasks.task: Create responsive GameSchedule component displaying NC State basketball and football schedules
tasks.description: Build component that integrates with ESPN API for live schedule data

tasks.task: Build live scores widget with real-time updates and game status indicators
tasks.description: Create widget showing current games, live scores, and game progress

tasks.task: Enhance RSS feed integration with caching, categorization, and search functionality
tasks.description: Improve news system with better performance and search capabilities

tasks.task: Create player profile pages with stats, photos, and social media links
tasks.description: Build comprehensive player pages with career stats and current season data

tasks.task: Develop fan community features including comments, predictions, and fan polls
tasks.description: Create interactive features for fan engagement and community building

tasks.task: Optimize all components for mobile devices and ensure Core Web Vitals performance
tasks.description: Ensure mobile-first responsive design and achieve Lighthouse scores > 90

tasks.task: Integrate local Raleigh data including sports bars, ticket vendors, and campus events
tasks.description: Add local business and event data to enhance fan experience

tasks.task: Generate comprehensive documentation for all components, APIs, and deployment processes
tasks.description: Create complete documentation for developers and users

tasks.task: Review all existing code for best practices, security issues, and performance optimizations
tasks.description: Comprehensive code quality review and recommendations

tasks.task: Refactor codebase for optimal performance, bundle size, and maintainability
Implement comprehensive testing suite with unit, integration, and E2E tests
tasks.description: Create complete testing infrastructure with automated test runs
